notes: Frontend implementation complete for T002. Uses shadcn Card, Badge, ScrollArea, Separator components. Status polling every 2 seconds with automatic stop on completion. Toast notifications via sonner. SummaryPanel displays topics, decisions, actions, and LNO tasks with proper animations and accessibility.
user_journey: User uploads file → sees 'Processing' badge with spinner → backend processes file → status polling detects completion → 'Complete' badge appears → toast notification shows 'Summary ready for {filename}' → SummaryPanel slides in with all extracted data (topics, decisions, actions, LNO tasks) → user can scroll through all sections
user_action_enabled: User can now see AI-generated summaries automatically appear after file upload without manual intervention. User can view topics as badges, decisions with checkmarks, actions with priority indicators, and LNO tasks organized in three columns. Low confidence summaries show 'Review Required' badge.

accessibility.keyboard_navigation: Full keyboard support for interactive elements

testing.test_coverage: All rendering scenarios, empty states, confidence thresholds, polling behavior
